from sortedcontainers import SortedList

class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:

        # 将点转换为两个维度：x+y 和 x-y
        transformed_points_plus = SortedList([x + y for x, y in points])
        transformed_points_minus = SortedList([x - y for x, y in points])

        min_distance = float('inf')

        for i, (x, y) in enumerate(points):
            # 从两个 SortedList 中移除当前点
            plus = x + y
            minus = x - y
            transformed_points_plus.remove(plus)
            transformed_points_minus.remove(minus)

            # 计算当前配置下的最大曼哈顿距离
            max_distance = max(transformed_points_plus[-1] - transformed_points_plus[0],
                               transformed_points_minus[-1] - transformed_points_minus[0])

            # 更新最小的最大曼哈顿距离
            min_distance = min(min_distance, max_distance)

            # 将当前点重新加入 SortedList 中
            transformed_points_plus.add(plus)
            transformed_points_minus.add(minus)

        return min_distance
